translation.en: [narrator] Once upon a time, there lived a very large
translation.ko: 옛날옛적에 아주 크고 슬픈 개가 살았어요

translation.en: His family got mad at him just for being himself.
They locked him away in a high tower
just so he couldn't join Billy's birthday party.
translation.ko: 빌리의 생일 파티에 참석하지 못하게 했어요

translation.en: No one said it was easy being a dog.
translation.ko: 개로 사는 건 참 쉽지 않아요

translation.en: You can't ban me from Billy's party.
translation.ko: 빌리의 파티에 못 가게 할 순 없어

translation.en: It won't be a party without me.
[man] Gather round, boys and girls, and watch this!
[Billy] Uh, he's up in my room being punished.
I'm having so much fun watching your brother's lame party.
translation.ko: 네 동생의 시시한 파티를 보는 게 너무 재밌어

translation.en: [Billy] Let's see how high we can jump.
translation.ko: 얼마나 높이 뛸 수 있는지 보자

translation.en: Oh, Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil!
You know I can say your name 76,345 times in a row.
translation.ko: 난 당신 이름을 76,345번 연속으로 말할 수 있어
넌 아무 데도 못 가, 마마듀크

translation.en: Dad, why can't Marmaduke join the party?
translation.ko: 아빠, 마마듀크도 같이 놀면 안 돼요?

translation.en: Billy, he's got to stay up there until he learns his lesson.
translation.ko: 빌리, 마마듀크는 잘못을 깨달을 때까지 못 내려와

translation.en: Phil, don't you think you're being too hard on poor Marmaduke?
translation.ko: 필, 불쌍한 마마듀크한테 너무 심한 거 아니야?

translation.en: Maybe we need to enroll Marmaduke in obedience school.
Phil can't be mad at me for being a dog.
translation.ko: 필은 내가 개처럼 군다고 화내면 안 되지

translation.en: All dogs like to chase cats.
translation.ko: 모든 개는 고양이를 뒤쫓는 걸 좋아해

translation.en: [Marmaduke] No dog can resist a fresh bone.
translation.ko: 어떤 개도 신선한 뼈를 거부할 순 없어

translation.en: [Marmaduke] One man's trash is another dog's treasure.
translation.ko: 한 남자의 쓰레기는 다른 개의 보물이지

translation.en: [Marmaduke] It's Phil's favorite chair, but he knows we like to wrestle over it.
translation.ko: 저건 필이 아끼는 의자지만 서로 차지하려고 싸우길 좋아해

translation.en: Fine. You want to play hardball?
-[marching band music playing] -I will march in protest! -I'll call my senator! -[drum thumping]
translation.ko: 항의 시위를 할 거야 내 상원 의원한테 전화할 거야!

translation.en: I want justice, and I want it now!
-I won't rest for one second! -[music stops]
Just the way you like it.
Oh, you picked the wrong day, you buzzy little--
translation.ko: 날을 잘못 골랐어 이 윙윙대는 작은…

translation.en: Oh, look. The life of the party.
-I hope my makeup doesn't run! -[kids scream]
This is the best party ever!
We have to do something about Marmaduke.
Maybe obedience school isn't such a bad idea.
translation.ko: 복종 학교도 그렇게 나쁜 생각은 아닌 것 같아

translation.en: Susie’s video of Marmaduke has gone viral!
translation.ko: 수지의 마마듀크 영상이 인터넷에서 대박 났어요

translation.en: Definitely time to find that obedience school.
This "Pool Flop Fail" video is unbelievable!
That furry rebel without a clue is totally out of control.
translation.ko: 저 털북숭이 반항아는 완전히 통제 불능이에요

translation.en: A dog like this is impossible to train,
even for the world's greatest dog trainer… -Hmm. -…Guy Hilton.
translation.ko: 세계 최고의 반려견 훈련사 가이 힐턴에게도요

translation.en: Guy won the last six World Dog Championships in a row.
translation.ko: "6회 세계 챔피언" 가이는 세계 도그 챔피언십에서 6회 연속 우승했죠

translation.en: until he finds a worthy challenge.
translation.ko: 도전할 만한 개를 찾을 때까지 말이죠
불가능을 가능하게 하는 건 내 특기야

translation.en: I will show the world that I can train any dog.
translation.ko: 어떤 개든 훈련시킬 수 있다는 걸 세상에 보여주겠어

translation.en: step right up to see the Eighth Wonder of the World!
translation.ko: 세계 8대 불가사의를 바로 앞에서 만나 보세요!

translation.en: [teenage boy] Oh my God. It's really him!
Now, remember, this is a celebrity dog.
So take your pictures, only pet him once, and--
translation.ko: 그러니 사진을 찍고 한 번만 쓰다듬고…

translation.en: I don't want you drawing attention to that embarrassing doggy flop video.
translation.ko: 그 망신스러운 개 동영상 사방팔방 소문내지 마

translation.en: I can't let my son charge kids from the neighborhood to meet our dog.
translation.ko: 내 아들이 우리 개로 장사하게 할 순 없어

translation.en: What kinda father would that make me?
You can have 10% of all profits.
Marmaduke has a conference call with a big Hollywood producer coming up.
translation.ko: 마마듀크는 할리우드의 유명 제작자와 전화 회의가 있어요

translation.en: [Marmaduke] I need hair and makeup over here.
[Guy] ♪ Oh, I want that doggy Yes, right now ♪
♪ I don’t want a cat that goes meow ♪
♪ I don’t want a bird or a fat old cow ♪
-[tires screeching] - ♪ I want that dog somehow ♪
So of all the dogs in the world, you wanna train Marmaduke
translation.ko: 세상의 모든 개를 제쳐두고 마마듀크를 훈련시켜서

translation.en: to become the next World Champion?
After I won last year's World Championship,
I said I wouldn't train another dog until I found a worthy challenge.
translation.ko: 도전할 만한 개를 찾기 전까진 출전하지 않겠다고 다짐했죠

translation.en: Do you really think he's got the pedigree and winning form of a world champion?
translation.ko: 정말 우리 개가 세계 챔피언이 될 혈통과 자질이 있을까요?

translation.en: -[Phil] So you want to train Marmaduke… -Mmm.
He's the challenge that I've been looking for.
I have black belts… -[chomps] -…in multiple disciplines.
I have a PhD in animal training technology and hold 33 patents.
translation.ko: 동물 훈련 기술 박사 학위도 있고 특허도 33개나 있죠

translation.en: I am also the only person to ever win the World Dog Championship
translation.ko: 또한 세계 도그 챔피언십에서 6번이나 연속 우승한

translation.en: I can turn your dog into a champion.
translation.ko: 당신 개를 챔피언으로 만들 수 있어요

translation.en: It would be nice for Marmaduke to learn how to obey the rules, but…
translation.ko: 마마듀크가 규칙을 따르는 법을 배우면 좋겠지만

translation.en: The winning dog receives the title of World Champion, but, more importantly, you'll earn the respect…
translation.ko: 우승한 개는 세계 챔피언 타이틀을 획득하지만, 더욱 중요한 건
개를 사랑하는 전 세계의 존경을 받게 되죠

translation.en: the winner receives one million dollars.
Every dog just needs the proper training to bring out their inner champion.
translation.ko: 모든 개는 적절한 훈련을 통해 내면의 챔피언을 끌어낼 수 있어요

translation.en: Okay, but I don't want my baby to suffer.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 근데 우리 개가 고통받는 건 싫어요

translation.en: There's a champion inside Marmaduke. It's just covered up in
translation.ko: 마마듀크 안에 챔피언이 있어요 가려져 있을 뿐이죠

translation.en: It's a dog-eat-dog world, Guy Hilton.
And you are about to show the world just how hungry you are.
translation.ko: 네가 얼마나 배가 고픈지 세상에 보여줄 때야

translation.en: Sure could use my trusty steed to track down Black Bart.
translation.ko: 내 믿음직한 말을 타고 블랙 바트 추적에 나설 시간이군

translation.en: [King Tut] Here we go again. The good, the bad, and the clueless.
translation.ko: 또 시작이군 석양의 허당 무법자가 나타났다

translation.en: -[Marmaduke] Move it or lose it, cowboy! -[horse neighs]
Guy Hilton is our only hope. [sighs]
[Marmaduke] Hey, that doormat looks like Phil.
Hmm. You are no longer Marmaduke.
Uh! Whoa! Hey, man! That's my tag!
You will stop all bad habits.

translation.ko: 나쁜 습관은 다 버려 이건 정말 아니라고 본다

translation.en: It’s time you forget everything you've ever known.
translation.ko: 이제껏 네가 알았던 건 전부 잊어버려

translation.en: You must earn the right to get your name back.
translation.ko: 네 이름을 되찾을 권리를 얻어야 해

translation.en: you must become strong enough to do the impossible!
translation.ko: 불가능한 걸 할 만큼 강해져야 해

translation.en: Uh, all right. That's it. I've had enough.
There's a stack of French toast with Billy's name on it that I'm about to-- -[Guy grunts] -[Marmaduke] Whoa!
translation.ko: 빌리의 프렌치토스트를 내가 다 먹어 치울…

translation.en: You will leave when I tell you.
If you don't get out of my way, I'm gonna have to unleash
Puddin's, uh, not much of a fighter.
You might wanna close your eyes, Puddin'.
[grunts] You can't push me around, jerk!
You must be prepared for any and all situations.
You have to show me that trick.
I heard Black Bart's been rustlin' around these parts.
translation.ko: 블랙 바트가 주변의 가축을 훔치고 다닌단 소문을 들었어

translation.en: You know I can't say no when you do that face.
translation.ko: 그런 표정을 지으면 거절 못 하는 거 알잖아

translation.en: Marmaduke doesn't have time to play cowboy. He's in training.
translation.ko: 마마듀크는 놀 시간 없어 훈련 중이야

translation.en: But I hardly even saw him today.
That's because he's working very hard to get ready for the dog show.
Who cares about some stupid dog show?
Billy will be fine. Come on, boy.
Oh. Okay, this is where we both jump for the couch and have that big fight
translation.ko: 좋아요, 이쯤에서 우리 둘이 소파에서 뒤엉켜 싸우다가

translation.en: that ends in manly bear hugs.
Get some rest. Tomorrow's a big day.
You're just gonna let me have it.
[Marmaduke] Man, what do you have against sleep?
With the help of my newest robotech training system,
I will turn you into a champion.
You will learn the proper way to stand and walk
translation.ko: 제대로 서고 걷는 법을 배우게 될 거고 "그레이트데인 도이체도게"

translation.en: and learn to control your impulse to eat.
translation.ko: "복종 훈련" 먹고 싶은 충동을 조절하는 법을 배울 거야

translation.en: [Guy] And you will train on different obstacles
translation.ko: 그리고 다양한 장애물에서 훈련할 거야 "장애물 훈련 장대, 링, 물어뜯는 턱"

translation.en: until you have the speed and agility of a champion.
translation.ko: "장애물 훈련 장대, 링, 물어뜯는 턱" 챔피언의 속도와 민첩성을 얻을 때까지

translation.en: [Guy] You must control your impulse to eat.
[Marmaduke grunts] There's no reason to start so early.
-[Marmaduke] The sun isn't even up. -[Guy straining]
[Marmaduke] Oh, why am I doing this? I'm gonna get chopped in half!
translation.ko: 내가 왜 이걸 하지? 난 반 토막 날 거야!

translation.en: -[grunts] -Let's see how well you play with fire.
We did it! We did it! [laughs gleefully] We did it!
You're Guy, you know? With, like, a capital G.
Tomorrow, you enter your first competition.
[Barbara] Why is Dad out shopping for a new car?
translation.ko: 아빠는 왜 새 차를 사러 갔지?

translation.en: Because he thinks Marmaduke is gonna make us rich.
translation.ko: 마마듀크가 우리를 부자로 만들 거라고 생각하니까

translation.en: Billy, stop saying true things about your father.
translation.ko: 빌리, 아빠에 대해 사실대로 말하지 마

translation.en: Why? All he cares about is the prize money.
Mom, if Marmaduke wins, can I get a pony?
[announcer] Welcome to the County Dog Show!
translation.ko: "정문 카운티 도그쇼" 카운티 도그쇼에 오신 걸 환영합니다

translation.en: And now, I'd like to introduce Henri and Philippe!
the dog you've all been waiting for.
Come on, people. Don't be shy.
Come on up and take a close look at the future World Champion.
translation.ko: 올라와서 미래의 세계 챔피언을 자세히 보세요

translation.en: Look how beautiful Shimmer Shampoo makes Zeus's hair, no?
translation.ko: 쉬머 샴푸가 제우스의 머리를 얼마나 아름답게 만드는지 보세요

translation.en: That is the best-looking dog I've ever seen!
That's just the lights from the-- Oh! Ah!
Wait, what's that supposed to mean?
And don't forget to take advantage of our two-for-one offer for Shimmer Shampoo.
translation.ko: 원 플러스 원 쉬머 샴푸 특별가 혜택을 놓치지 마세요

translation.en: Guaranteed to turn your dog into a dream… -[Philippe chuckles] -…like the Zeus.
translation.ko: 여러분의 개를 제우스처럼 멋지게 만들어줄 겁니다
- 저렇게 빛나는 이유가 있었네 - 빌리, 봐

translation.en: [Marmaduke] He uses name-brand shampoo. I use soap.
translation.ko: 쟨 유명 브랜드 샴푸를 쓰는데 난 세제를 써

translation.en: Mom, can I use Shimmer Shampoo?
Don't be silly. You're not using dog shampoo. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 바보 같은 소리 개 샴푸를 쓰면 어떡해?

translation.en: Come out to the big show and see the next World Dog Champion!
translation.ko: 큰 대회에 오셔서 차기 세계 도그 챔피언을 보세요!

translation.en: And don't forget to take advantage of our two-for-one offer for the Shimmer Shampoo!
translation.ko: 원 플러스 원 쉬머 샴푸 특가 혜택을 놓치지 마세요

translation.en: Handmade by me and my brother.
Come to buy some shampoo, fleabag?
Or did you just want to see what a champion looks like up close?
translation.ko: 아니면 챔피언이 어떻게 생겼는지 자세히 보고 싶었어?

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna be a champion too.
translation.ko: 그거 알아? 나도 챔피언이 될 거야

translation.en: Okay. First of all, ah, I'm going to be the next World Champion.
translation.ko: 좋아, 잘 들어 차기 세계 챔피언은 내가 될 거야

translation.en: Second of all, the only thing you're going to win is
total humiliation for you and your family.
You're all signed up for your first dog show.
Oh, I hope this disguise works and no one recognizes me.
translation.ko: 이 변장이 효과가 있어서 아무도 날 못 알아봐야 할 텐데

translation.en: Come on, we have to get ready for the competition.
Today, you'll show them all that you are a champion.
translation.ko: 오늘 네가 챔피언이란 걸 만천하에 보여줘

translation.en: So many new friends to talk to.
-You have to believe you're a winner. -Huh? [grunts]
-[warbles] -Stay put while I find out when we're up.
translation.ko: 우리 순서를 확인하는 동안 꼼짝 말고 있어

translation.en: I'm a winner. I'm a winner. I'm a winner.
Okay, okay. Act cool. Just ignore him, and he won't bother you.
translation.ko: 좋아, 쿨하게 행동해 개무시하면 귀찮게 안 할 거야

translation.en: -It was so great to meet you earlier. -[sighs]
Hey, buddy. I just wanted to apologize for how I acted earlier.
translation.ko: 친구, 내가 무례하게 굴었던 거 사과하고 싶었어

translation.en: But did… did… did you just apologize?
I spent the whole day on that lousy stage taking pictures and…
translation.ko: 온종일 그 허접한 무대에서 사진을 찍었더니

translation.en: -I just lost it. -[woman] Oh! Oh no!
Us show dogs have to stick together, bro-bro.
I can tell I need to earn your trust. Let me show you something.
translation.ko: 날 못 믿는 모양이네 보여줄 게 있어

translation.en: Now, there's a well-known secret about every single dog show.
translation.ko: 모든 도그쇼엔 잘 알려진 비밀이 있어

translation.en: Nobody comes here for stupid little trophies or fancy ribbons.
translation.ko: 다들 쓸데없는 트로피나 화려한 리본엔 관심 없어
다들 쓸데없는 트로피나 화려한 리본엔 관심 없어 우리가 여기 오는 건…

translation.en: [Marmaduke] It's… it's a… I don't… I can't…
Yeah, yeah. I'm okay. I'm okay. Just… just gimme a sec, all right?
translation.ko: 응, 괜찮아 시간을 줘, 정말 아름다워

translation.en: But we're not supposed to eat a large meal before a competition.
translation.ko: 하지만 시합 전에 배불리 먹으면 안 되잖아

translation.en: A large meal before a competition is exactly what you need.
translation.ko: 시합 전엔 꼭 배불리 먹어야 해

translation.en: We don't have much time, so dig in.
Okay, I'm in. But just a tiny taste. [exhales]
I gotta rush and get highlight touch-ups.
[announcer] All contestants please report to the main stage.
[announcer] All contestants please report to the main stage.
[announcer] The dog show competition is starting. All contestants must get ready.
translation.ko: 도그쇼 대회가 시작됩니다 모든 참가견은 준비하세요

translation.en: [groaning] I can't believe I ate the whole thing.
translation.ko: 그 많은 음식을 다 먹어 치우다니

translation.en: Don't worry. I was just checking my blood sugar.
Now, remember, float around the perimeter.
That's it. I'm never smelling a dog's rear end again.
translation.ko: 진짜 구려! 다시는 개 엉덩이 냄새 안 맡을래

translation.en: What happened to you? Did you swallow the Goodyear Blimp?
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거야? 대형 비행선이라도 삼켰어?

translation.en: He looks like me after Taco Tuesday.
translation.ko: 타코 화요일 다음 날 내 모습 같네

translation.en: [Zeus] How was your snack? -You look a bit bloated. [chuckles] -[grunting nervously]
I… I'm fine, thank you. I… I just have to…
[panting] It's too far. I'm not gonna make it.
-Ah. I can do it. I can do it. -[tires screeching]
-[man] What is that? -[kid] Oh my God!
I’ve never seen anything more embarrassing in all my life!
translation.ko: 내 평생 그렇게 창피한 건 처음 봤어!

translation.en: I can't believe I thought you had a shot at greatness.
translation.ko: 네가 위대해질 수 있다고 믿은 내가 한심하지

translation.en: You've discovered a new breed of dog.
You don't have to do this anymore.
She shares a home with Scooby Poo!
Say something nice to your dog.
You are who you are, Marmaduke.
Oh, Phil means well, but he's not really good at the old pick-me-up speech.
translation.ko: 필은 좋은 뜻으로 한 말이야 격려의 말엔 젬병이지만

translation.en: Oh, come on. It's not that big a deal.
So you lost the dog show competition.
I lost it in the championship trophy in front of 500 people.
Do you have any idea how humiliating that is?
-Then I got my butt stuck in the trophy. -[inhales sharply]
And tt took two security guards to get it out!
Well, that's a memory the dog show crowd will cherish for the rest of their lives.
translation.ko: 도그쇼 관중들에게 평생 잊지 못할 추억을 선사한 거야

translation.en: Probably best if you lay low for a while.
And I always thought Dad would be the reason why I had no friends in school.
translation.ko: 난 항상 아빠 때문에 학교에 친구가 없다고 생각했는데

translation.en: Some dogs are meant to be champions.
Some dogs are meant to be…

translation.ko: 어지럽히고 칠칠맞지 못하고 훈련이 안 된 개들

translation.en: Mom's right. The whole thing is unfortunate.
translation.ko: 엄마 말이 맞아 일이 이렇게 돼서 안타깝지만

translation.en: But the best thing we can do is put the whole thing behind us.
translation.ko: 이왕 이렇게 됐으니 모든 걸 잊어버리자꾸나

translation.en: Guy wants us to pay for the training costs.
It was supposed to come out of the prize money
[Dottie] Oh, honey. It's gonna be okay.
[Dottie] Kids, some dogs are meant to be champions.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 어떤 개들은 챔피언이 될 운명이야

translation.en: Some dogs are meant to be…
[Zeus] The only thing you're going to win
is total humiliation for you and your family.
Maybe we need to enroll Marmaduke in obedience school.
[Guy] You've discovered a new breed of dog,
They’ll be better off without me.
translation.ko: 내가 없는 게 더 나을 거야

translation.en: What were you doing out there?
[King Tut] I knew I wasn’t in any danger
because you’ll do whatever it takes to make sure
that the whole family is safe and sound.
Tell that to Billy and Barbara.
translation.ko: 빌리랑 바버라는 그렇게 생각 안 해

translation.en: [King Tut] Nobody wins their first competition.
You just need to go back out there and make things right.
translation.ko: 다시 출전해서 잘못된 걸 바로잡으면 돼

translation.en: Are you kidding? All that training?
-There is a champion inside of you. -[soft piano music playing]
I'm the greatest dog of all time.
[King Tut] I wouldn't go that far, but top five million for sure.
translation.ko: 그 정도는 아니지만 상위 500만 마리 안엔 들지

translation.en: It was unfair for me to think that you had what it takes to be a champion.
translation.ko: 네가 챔피언이 될 자질이 있다고 생각한 건 불공평했어

translation.en: But all you’ve done is made it impossible to be a champion.
translation.ko: 근데 넌 챔피언이 되는 걸 불가능하게 했어

translation.en: I'll show you what a real champion can do.
This amazing dog has just done the impossible
translation.ko: 이 놀라운 개는 불가능한 일을 해냈고

translation.en: and made a solo trip around the world.
[reporter] We're also getting reports that this mysterious dog
translation.ko: 또한 이 수수께끼 개는 만리장성을 횡단했으며

translation.en: traversed the Great Wall, and was also spotted crossing--
translation.ko: 또한 이 수수께끼 개는 만리장성을 횡단했으며 그것도 모자라…
이 개는 두 번째 기회를 원한다는 거잖아요

translation.en: Well, I gave him a chance, and he failed.
There's no champion inside of him.
If you don't get off my lawn, I'll call the cops.
translation.ko: 내 잔디밭에서 안 나가면 경찰을 부를 거야

translation.en: Because it appears somebody stole your integrity.
translation.ko: 누군가 당신 인격을 훔쳐 간 것 같으니까

translation.en: You're the one that told Marmaduke you'd turn him into a world champion.
translation.ko: 마마듀크를 세계 챔피언으로 만들겠다고 한 건 당신이에요

translation.en: [man] That's right. Tell him how it is!
-But if there's a failure in this story… -[man] Tell him.
Nobody's ever called me a failure.
translation.ko: 아무도 날 실패작이라고 부른 적이 없어

translation.en: that I like what the boy said about me being a failure.
translation.ko: 저 꼬마가 날 실패작이라고 불러서 좋다는 거예요

translation.en: Never accepting failure. Never giving up.
translation.ko: 실패를 받아들이지 말고 절대 포기하지 마

translation.en: That is how you make the impossible possible.
And that is what made me
the greatest dog trainer the world has ever seen!
translation.ko: 날 세계 최고의 반려견 훈련사로 만들었지

translation.en: Thank you for calling me a failure!
You reminded me of what I saw in your dog in the first place.
translation.ko: 처음에 네 개한테서 봤던 걸 상기시켜줬어

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Oh, we're going to do great things.
Pack your bags, because we're going to the World Dog Championship!
translation.ko: 세계 도그 챔피언십에 나갈 거니까 짐을 싸요!

translation.en: Well, I think Marmaduke has his trainer back.
translation.ko: 마마듀크한테 다시 훈련사가 생긴 것 같다

translation.en: Nobody can annoy somebody into doing something they don't wanna do like my dog.
translation.ko: 아무도 하기 싫은 일을 억지로 하게 할 순 없어, 내 개처럼

translation.en: Yep. That's kinda always been my motto.
[Barbara] Yay! Marmaduke! You did it! I love you!
I have a favor to ask the President of the World Dog Championship.
translation.ko: 세계 도그 챔피언십 회장님께 부탁할 게 있어

translation.en: I want to bring a rookie
And don't make any dinner plans
because I'm taking you to that cozy place we went to last time.
translation.ko: 저번에 갔던 그 아늑한 식당에 당신을 데려갈 거니까

translation.en: [Billy] Oh, I hope Dad buys a car like this!
[Marmaduke] My stomach is bubbling, and that never ends well.
translation.ko: 속이 부글거려 이러면 결과가 안 좋아

translation.en: [in Spanish accent] What is that delicious smell?
[in French accent] This humidity is not doing my coat any favors.
translation.ko: 이 습도는 내 코트에 도움이 안 돼

translation.en: [in British accent] Give us another chop, eh?
If we are true to ourselves, then we have already won.
So which of these mangy mutts is fighting for second place?
translation.ko: 이 잡종 개들 중에 누가 2등 자리를 놓고 싸우지?

translation.en: [man] Can I get a picture of the greatest of all time?
translation.ko: 역사상 가장 위대한 개의 사진을 찍어도 될까요?

translation.en: Are we sure these are all dogs?
I mean, that one has two rear ends.
How does a dog get muscles like that?
There you go, sunshine. [chuckles] There you go.
Hey, Guy, where's my protein shake?
translation.ko: 가이, 내 단백질 셰이크 어디 있어?

translation.en: I'm not good in social situations. It gives me really bad gas.
translation.ko: 난 사교성이 없어 어색하면 방귀가 나온다고

translation.en: Thanks for making this happen at the last minute.
Of course. I was glad you called.
It's really good to see you.
but I've got to get back to my office now.
Are we still on for dinner?
[Amy] You do owe me a dinner.
[in French accent] I haven't seen you around.
[nervously] Yeah, well. Um, about that, I… I'm… I'm… I'm kinda new to this stuff, so…
translation.ko: 그래, 그게 말인데 이런 건 처음이라서…

translation.en: Juan, buddy, you call that a scarf?
I thought it was a dishrag.
Ooh, better cut back on the strudel.
Your belly's starting to drag on the floor.
All the way from Shanghai just to lose to me? [laughs]
Choose your words wisely, Mr. Zeus.

translation.ko: 세 치 혀가 독이 될 수 있어

translation.en: I never expected to see you again after what happened at the last dog show.
translation.ko: 지난번 도그쇼 대참사 후에 널 다시 볼 줄은 몰랐어

translation.en: You tricked me. You're a weasel.
Look, do you really want to go out on the competition floor
and embarrass yourself while the whole world is watching?
The only embarrassment here is you and your overpriced shampoo.
translation.ko: 여기서 망신스러운 건 너랑 너의 비싼 샴푸뿐이야

translation.en: Now, if you’ll excuse me, I have to prepare my victory speech.
translation.ko: 난 승리 연설을 준비해야 해서 이만

translation.en: [reporter] Welcome to the World Dog Championship.
translation.ko: 세계 도그 챔피언십에 오신 걸 환영합니다

translation.en: There are always so many incredible stories at this show.
translation.ko: 이 쇼에는 항상 놀라운 이야기가 많습니다

translation.en: But topping my list is the return of the dog whisperer himself,
translation.ko: 하지만 가장 놀라운 건 우리의 도그 위스퍼러

translation.en: Guy Hilton, here with the star of the "Pool Flop Fail,"
I mean, I wasn't ready to be born. I was born to be ready.
translation.ko: 태어날 준비가 된 게 아니라 태어날 때부터 준비됐다고

translation.en: The simple answer is just yes.
This year is going to be a doozy.
[announcer] Ah. And here they come in all their majesty.
[announcer] Looks like it's time to start the Obedience Section of the competition
translation.ko: 이제 복종 능력을 평가할 시간인 것 같군요

translation.en: where the canine's self-control is tested
with a baconized version of their favorite treat.
translation.ko: 출전견이 가장 좋아하는 베이컨 간식을 선보입니다

translation.en: Now, if I was a dog, ladies and gentlemen,
and my wife might say there's no "if" about it…
translation.ko: 제 아내는 제가 개만도 못하다고 하겠지만…

translation.en: …I… I would struggle during this part of the competition.
[in Spanish accent] My fans, they love me.
[announcer] Let's see if Juan Pedro can resist
What a great idea! That's amazing. [licks lips]
I love it! I love it!
[announcer] The little guy is eyeballing that taco,
translation.ko: 저 작은 개는 타코에 눈독을 들이지만

translation.en: but the promise of the Championship trophy is way stronger than a--
translation.ko: 챔피언십 트로피의 유혹이 훨씬 더 강하…

translation.en: Looks like Juan Pedro has been disqualified.
-[buzzer blares] -[trainer] No, it's not his fault!
-[mystical music playing] -The bacon is your enemy.
you have to become the bacon.
You are a strange little dog.
[whispering] Be the bacon. Come on, man. Be the bacon.
[Marmaduke] Hey, you could've saved me a bite.
He wouldn't be able to resist Shantrelle.
[announcer] One of my favorite events is the Obstacle Course.
Zeus crosses the finish line like a bolt of lightning.
Be the bacon, Marmaduke. You can do it.
translation.ko: 베이컨이 되어라, 마마듀크 넌 할 수 있어

translation.en: Remember, when you fall flat on your stupid face,
translation.ko: 그 멍청한 얼굴을 바닥에 처박고 넘어질 때 이 말을 기억해

translation.en: nobody expected you to win anyway.
translation.ko: 네가 우승하길 기대한 사람은 없었다는 걸

translation.en: Be the bacon. The bacon! The… the bacon!
I can't believe I did it.
In a crazy turn of events,
Guy Hilton's attempt to win the championship with a rookie dog
translation.ko: 신참 개와 챔피언십 우승을 노린 가이 힐턴이

translation.en: has ended in a terrible injury.
Looks like this underdog landed under his dog.
translation.ko: 이 약자가 그의 개 밑에 깔린 것 같군요

translation.en: [announcer] The talent show is about to begin.
Unfortunately, Marmaduke will not be competing
[Amy] Guy is at the hospital now.
I just wanted to let you know he's going to be fine.
I'm really sorry you won't be able to finish the show.
translation.ko: 대회를 못 끝내게 돼서 정말 유감이에요

translation.en: I think your dog has a lot of heart.
I've gotta go get ready for the talent show. Take care.
translation.ko: 전 탤런트 쇼를 준비해야 해요 안녕히 돌아가세요

translation.en: I know you're sad right now.
But this is just like the time that Jeremy Smith told Kathy he was gonna ask me to the Spring Dance,
translation.ko: 제러미 스미스가 캐시한테 나랑 봄 무도회에 가겠다고 해놓고

translation.en: but he ended up choosing Becky and I had to go with Mike.
translation.ko: 막판에 베키랑 가서 난 마이크랑 가야 했던 때 같아

translation.en: Should we just call a taxi and go home?
The Winslows are a lot of things.
Those neighbors who borrow tools and forget where they put them.
translation.ko: 도구를 빌리고 어디에 뒀는지 잊어버리는 이웃

translation.en: Marmaduke, you're not like those other dogs.
And I know the best dog in the whole world is staring me right in the face.
translation.ko: 세상에서 제일 훌륭한 개가 지금 날 쳐다보고 있어

translation.en: [Phil] So, if you wanna finish what you started…
Then I think we can find you a new trainer.
-[Marmaduke] Get in there, Puddin'. -[Dottie] Silly dog.
We've reached the final event that decides which of these amazing specimens
translation.ko: 대회의 마지막 순서입니다 이 훌륭한 참가견 중에 어떤 개가

translation.en: will be named the greatest dog on earth
Now to my favorite part, the talent show.
translation.ko: 이제 제가 제일 좋아하는 탤런트 쇼입니다

translation.en: [announcer] First up, it’s Vinnie and Ronnie
with their amazing display of the Staffordshire’s strength!
Next up, it’s Shantrelle and her seductive Parisian extravaganza!
translation.ko: 다음은 샨트렐과 그녀의 고혹적인 파리의 향연입니다!

translation.en: [announcer] Get ready for Zhi and Fu’s spectacular blend
of martial arts and the mystical powers of the East.
Wow, these dogs are putting on an amazing show. Yay!
Bu how did he land on the tip of that spear without getting skewered?
translation.ko: 창끝에 찔리지도 않고 가볍게 착지하다니 놀랍습니다

translation.en: demonstrating the mesmerizing power of the Afghan’s sparkling fur!
translation.ko: 아프간의 반짝이는 털이 뿜어내는 매혹적인 힘을 선보입니다

translation.en: Look deeply into the golden fleece of my Zeus.
translation.ko: 내 제우스의 황금 털을 자세히 들여다보세요

translation.en: You are now in a trance.
[Henri] You will give Zeus the perfect score.
Oh, uh… Wow, that was incredible!
[announcer] Marmaduke is back in the competition with his new trainer, Team Winslow.
translation.ko: 마마듀크가 새 트레이너 윈즐로 팀과 함께 돌아왔습니다

translation.en: Next up, Marmaduke and Billy take us back to the lawless days of the Wild West!
translation.ko: 다음은 마마듀크와 빌리가 무법천지 서부로 안내하겠습니다

translation.en: And I think Black Bart might be roamin' around these parts.
translation.ko: 블랙 바트가 이 지역을 어슬렁대는 것 같아

translation.en: You can’t get away from us, Black Bart.
translation.ko: 넌 도망칠 수 없어, 블랙 바트

translation.en: This is stupid. That isn't talent.
I can't believe you made it.
I wasn't gonna miss your big show.
translation.ko: 네 중요한 쇼를 놓칠 순 없지

translation.en: You can take it from here, pal.
[Marmaduke] I mean, what's not to love?
[announcer] And now, the moment you’ve all been waiting for.
-And this year's World Dog Champion is… -[drumroll]
I knew me quads would be me downfall.
translation.ko: 내 사두근 때문에 망할 줄 알았어

translation.en: At least I got to show the world what kind of dog I am.
translation.ko: 적어도 내가 어떤 개인지 세상에 보여줄 수 있었어

translation.en: Oh, Zeus is so, so special.
I knew he was a cheater.
We can't let him get away with this.
Who the heck is that guy? [chuckles nervously]
Huh? What are you guys doing?!
Hey! You got the wrong guy!
-And the new World Dog Champion is… -[drumroll]
I am going to rip those stupid floppy ears off your head!
translation.ko: 네 머리통에서 그 멍청한 귀를 뜯어낼 거야!

translation.en: Marmaduke never wanted to hurt anyone.
translation.ko: 마마듀크는 아무한테도 상처 주고 싶지 않았어요

translation.en: Never passing up a good bone.
His heart was always in the right place.
We should never have tried to train you.
-[machinery beeping] -You were perfect just the way you were.
Is there still time to hit the Awards Banquet?
-[security guard] Come on, you. -I'm the World Champion.
Don't let the doggy flap hit you on the way out.
translation.ko: 나갈 때 개문에 부딪히지 않게 조심해

translation.en: You are not like any dog I've ever met.
translation.ko: 넌 내가 만난 어떤 개랑도 달라

translation.en: Yeah, I… I've been hearing that a lot lately.
translation.ko: 그래, 요즘 그 말을 자주 들어

translation.en: [Marmaduke] So that's my rags-to-riches, happily-ever-after, Cinderella story.
translation.ko: 이게 내 출세담을 담은 해피 엔딩 신데렐라 이야기예요

translation.en: No more plot twists, darkest hours, or agonies of defeat.
translation.ko: 더는 반전도, 암울한 시간도 패배의 고뇌도 없어요

translation.en: So could I please have some of that bacon pizza now?
translation.ko: 그러니까 그 베이컨 피자 좀 먹어도 될까요?

translation.en: ♪ He's got a big heart Big love ♪
♪ The Greatest Dane In the whole darn town ♪

translation.ko: 하지만 내 가족은 이해 못 해

translation.en: ♪ I gotta eat It's my command ♪
translation.ko: 난 먹어야 해 본능을 따르는 거라고

translation.en: ♪ Now, I love my family Yes, I do ♪
♪ But sometimes they think That I'm crazy too ♪
translation.ko: 하지만 때때로 내 가족은 내가 미쳤다고 생각해

translation.en: ♪ There's just no if, ands, or buts ♪
translation.ko: "신디케이트 만화 '마마듀크'를 바탕으로 함" 만약에, 그리고, 하지만은 없어

translation.en: ♪ But when I see food I kinda go nuts! ♪
translation.ko: 하지만 먹을 걸 보면 난 미쳐버려

translation.en: ♪ I try to be cool But then I lose it ♪
♪ If I don't eat, I have a fit! ♪
♪ Then there's cats I gotta chase them ♪
♪ It's a dog's job It's my description ♪
translation.ko: 그건 개의 일이야 내가 하는 일이지

translation.en: ♪ Cars and bugs Postman and a cat ♪
♪ I chase them all And then I sleep on my mat ♪
♪ Don't wake up until the morning light ♪
♪ And then it starts all over again ♪
♪ I just get hungry and it never ends! ♪
♪ Now this is my life, as you can see ♪
♪ And I live with the Winslow family ♪
♪ I don't want money And I don't want fame ♪
♪ I just want love 'Cause that's the name of the game! ♪
translation.ko: 난 사랑만 원해 그게 가장 중요한 거니까!
